name: Number Crunchers
description:
Play the game of numbers and advance through the levels without getting eaten by troggles!

Guide Cruncher across the map of numbers and munch on the yummiest (correct) ones to advance. But be careful not to run into troggles. They're little monster things that prevent you from collecting all the right numbers.

Be sure to try all of the different categories from Evens and Odds, to Primes, Multiples, and Inequalities. And the further you advance, the levels get even harder, so do your best!

Challenge your friends and family to get the highest scores for each category.

Number Crunchers includes the option of 1 in-app purchase, which allows you to remove ads, and unlock 3 new game categories: Fractions, Ranges, and Angles in Quadrant

Start playing the game based on the Number Munchers classic today!
